abstract: Nate Chinen reviews 25th anniversary commemorative album Silver by jazz group Fourplay.
lead_paragraph: The group, which first took shape in 1990, adheres to form on its new album, a sleek but relaxed collection that highlights the band’s strengths as a rhythm section.

headline.main: Review: With ‘Silver,’ Fourplay Celebrates 25 Years of Smooth Jazz Stylings
headline.print_headline: Review: With ‘Silver,’ Fourplay Celebrates 25 Years of Smooth Jazz Stylings

snippet: The group, which first took shape in 1990, adheres to form on its new album, a sleek but relaxed collection that highlights the band’s strengths as a rhythm section.
